BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.checker.ShadowRuleConfigurationChecker.initShadowDataSources(Collection) does not presize the allocation of a collection
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.exception.data.UnsupportedShadowColumnTypeException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.exception.syntax.UnsupportedShadowInsertValueException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.route.engine.ShadowRouteEngineFactory.newInstance(QueryContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.route.engine.dml.AbstractShadowDMLStatementRouteEngine.getRelatedShadowTables(Collection, ShadowRule) does not presize the allocation of a collection

org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.route.engine.dml.ShadowInsertStatementRoutingEngine$ShadowColumnConditionIterator.getColumnValues(List, int): 1st parameter 'insertValueContexts' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.route.engine.util.ShadowExtractor.extractValueInSimpleExpressionSegment(ExpressionSegment, List) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.route.engine.util.ShadowExtractor.extractValues(ExpressionSegment, List) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.rule.ShadowRule.getAllShadowDataSourceMappings() does not presize the allocation of a collection
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.shadow.rule.ShadowRule.getRelatedShadowDataSourceMappings(String) does not presize the allocation of a collection
